messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: As hop, i decalre ian our new captain

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Veek-Rei (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">We don't have many books at the moment except ones about xenos and the one I made but you can make your own! so come by the library and start writing!!</font>

messages.author: What I hear
messages.body: <font face="Verdana" color=black>The voice are always pestering me do this, do that, kill them, trust them. It's hard to ignore them when they are always talking and talking. I see many things that aren't real. Sometime I can see my parents who aren't there. They disappear when I approach them. The voices want blood, my blood</font>

comments.author: Madalina Blitz (Security Officer)
